snippet.title: 🍇 𝓓𝓮𝓵𝓲𝓰𝓱𝓽𝓯𝓾𝓵 𝓒𝓸𝓵𝓸𝓻 𝓗𝓮𝓬𝓴𝓮𝓻𝔂 🍇
snippet.description:
📺 Update 1.333 brings two tweakable color filters: "B/W" and "HUE"
B/W shrinks color value amplitude then makes the picture desaturated.
HUE shifts all screen colors.

You can switch between several presets during the game:
【﻿Ｄｉｍ】
【﻿Ｄｉｍ　ｗｉｔｈ　ｈｉｇｈｌｉｇｈｔｓ】
【﻿Ｈａｌｆ－Ｄｉｍ】
【﻿Ｎｕｌｌ　Ｎｕｌｌ】
【﻿Ｍｏｎｏｃｈｒｏｍｅ】
【﻿Ｄｅｓａｔｕｒａｔｅｄ】
【﻿Ｒａｎｄｏｍ】
or find your personal favorite tuning and store it in a 【﻿Ｃｕｓｔｏｍ】slot.

🖥 【﻿Ｓｔｅａｍ】: https://store.steampowered.com/app/719750/PUSS/
📱 【﻿Ａｐｐ　Ｓｔｏｒｅ】: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1476927962
📱 【﻿Ｇｏｏｇｌｅ　Ｐｌａｙ】: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TeamCoil.PUSS

#PUSSTHEGAME #Steam #Mobile
